This document describes the current stable version of Celery (4.3). For development docs, go here.

celery.apps.worker¶

Worker command-line program.

This module is the 'program-version' of celery.worker.

It does everything necessary to run that module as an actual application, like installing signal handlers, platform tweaks, and so on.

class celery.apps.worker.Worker(app=None, hostname=None, **kwargs)[소스]¶

Worker as a program.

emit_banner()[소스]¶
extra_info()[소스]¶
install_platform_tweaks(worker)[소스]¶

macOS_proxy_detection_workaround()[소스]¶

See https://github.com/celery/celery/issues#issue/161.
